function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion and exclusion criteria for research may not cover all relevant urban contexts related to pandemics of respiratory diseases, leading to a limited scope of the study.","Impact":"Incomplete criteria may result in overlooking crucial information and potential solutions for controlling disease spread in different urban settings.","Mitigation":"Conduct a comprehensive review of diverse urban contexts and consider input from experts in different geographical regions to ensure inclusivity.","Technologies":"Smart surveillance systems for monitoring disease spread in diverse urban settings.","People":"Researchers, urban planners, and policymakers involved in the study of pandemics and urban planning responses.","Owner":"Research institutions and government health agencies."}]}
